title: Ask Riot: Doom Bots, dragons, and balance

I can't wait for doom bots, i'm quite new to league but i saw a vid on doom mots before I started playing League and it was amazing, I want it!

what about the role adc? i mean.. its getting a bit boring having to rely on your jungler or mid lane t ocarry you every game.. especially in higher levels of play the game for an adc is decided by who tp ganks and 4 mans properly. i mean.. when does winning 2v2 ever happen..? and when it does kennens coming in with teleport to shut you down. numerous games are won/lost before the game even begins just because of how focused the bot lane is and to be quite fair not many people enjoy adc because you either cs = deny cs wait til 3 items and then team fight or go for kills  get 4 manned go 0-8 and get 1 shot by the enemy kennen or leblanc, and trust me on someone like jinx there is nothing i can do when a leblanc double distortions on top of me (flas is pretty much useless) and insta kills me. same with kennens e, when you see that little rat coming towards you, its game over. cant someonething be done to change that playstyle? change some champions over all mobility, i dont see how a 10 second cooldown can be equal to or better then a 300 second summoner spell.. oh well guess its just time to switch roles. xd
